title: SL vs AUS test in Galle  to be dedicated to legendary Shane Warne
body_lines: Sri Lanka Cricket (SLC) together with the Tourism and Sport ministries have made arrangements to host the test match between Sri Lanka and Australia in Galle to be dedicated to the legendary Australian leg spinner Shane Warne.
Tourism Minister Harin Fernando said the CEO of Australian Cricket has confirmed that Shane Warne’s family members will be attending the match.
The first test between Sri Lanka and Australia will be played from June 29 to July 3 at the Galle International Stadium.
Shane Warne, the legendary 'leggie', died from of a suspected cardiac arrest on March 4, 2022 in Thailand.
